member.name: M:Ekstrand.EnumUtil.GetEnumDescription(System.Enum)
member.summary: Returns the description value from a DescriptionAttribute field.
member.returns: Returns String DescriptionAttribute value otherwise the enumeration type string name.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.EnumUtil.GetEnumTextAttribute(System.Enum)
member.summary: Return the custom attribute called TextAttribute text value.
member.returns: Returns the TextAttribute value otherwise the Enumeration type string value.
member.remarks: This would require the custom TextAttribute class with in Ekstrand name space.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.EnumUtil.EnumList``1
member.summary: Returns a list of enumeration type element
member.returns: Returns a list of enumeration type element otherwise returns an empty list.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.EnumUtil.EnumCount``1
member.summary: Returns total number of elements in an enumeration type.
member.returns: Returns the number of elements in a given enumeration type otherwise -1

member.name: M:Ekstrand.EnumUtil.EnumValueFromDescription``1(System.String)
member.summary: Return enumeration type element based on description attribute value.
member.returns: Returns the enumeration type element based on its description attribute string value, otherwise; return default base enumeration type element.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.EnumUtil.EnumToStringList``1
member.summary: Returns a list of each enumeration type element name constant.
member.returns: Return a list of string containing the enumeration type name constant otherwise empty list.

member.name: T:Ekstrand.TextAttribute
member.summary: Custom attribute used for custom text.
member.remarks: This attribute intended for strings that would be seen by end users.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.TextAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Text to be associated with object target.
